name: Fruit Jelly Cups Recipe | Zubaida Tariq | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Fruit Jelly Cups Recipe: Fruit Cocktail 1 tin Strawberry Jelly 1 packet Walnuts (peeled and chopped) ½ cup Fresh Cream 1 packet Vanilla Custard 2 tbsp Fresh Milk ½ liter Sugar as required
instructions: Dissolve strawberry jelly in hot water and keep it aside to set. Now cook ½ liter milk and sugar till its thick, remove and keep it aside to cool. Now chop jelly into small cubes. Now spread ready custard in a bowl, fruit cocktail, strawberry jelly cubes, walnuts and fresh cream. Now fill rest of the bowl this way and serve.
